sentences.en: Elaborate efforts were made to reconstruct what had happened.
sentences.cn: 为重现当时的情景，他们做了大量细致的工作。

sentences.en: Fossils allow us to reconstruct ancient ecology.
sentences.cn: 化石可以让我们知道古时的生态环境。

sentences.en: He began to reconstruct the events of 21 December 1988, when flight 103 disappeared.
sentences.cn: 他开始再现1988年12月21日的103次航班失踪事件。

sentences.en: He had plastic surgery to help reconstruct his badly damaged face.
sentences.cn: 他做了整形手术以修复其严重受伤的面部。

sentences.en: He tried to reconstruct his dreams.
sentences.cn: 他企图把这些梦重新回忆出来.

sentences.en: Human fossils unearthed there are helping to reconstruct the earliest stages of human existence.
sentences.cn: 出土的人类化石有助于复原人类生活的最早期阶段.

sentences.en: If the whole place were swept away tomorrow, Letitia Dale could reconstruct it.
sentences.cn: 如果明天这里全部被夷为平地, 利蒂霞·戴尔也能够重建它.

sentences.en: It is not enough to tinker at the edges; our objective must be to reconstruct the entire system.
sentences.cn: 只在外缘做一些小修小补是不够的，我们的目标必须是重建整个系统。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reconstruct the complete symphony from these manuscript sketches.
sentences.cn: 想要通过这些手写草稿恢复这一交响乐的全貌是不可能的.

sentences.en: On earth astronomers use computers to reconstruct the images and display them on television screens.
sentences.cn: 地球上的天文学家运用计算机来重现这些图像,并将它们展示在电视屏幕上.

sentences.en: One cannot today even reconstruct the state of mind which would render such gestures possible.
sentences.cn: 即使到了现在,人们也很难设想出,当时究竟是什么心理状态使他采取那样的姿态.

sentences.en: Police were reconstructing the movements of the murdered couple.
sentences.cn: 警方正在重现这对被害夫妇的行为活动。

sentences.en: The police managed to piece together the jigsaw and reconstruct the victim's last hours.
sentences.cn: 警方成功地将线索拼在一起,重现了受害人生前最后几个小时的情况.

sentences.en: The task ahead is to reconstruct the building.
sentences.cn: 眼前的任务是要重建这栋大楼。

sentences.en: These cells reconstruct the receptors and glands with their normal spacing.
sentences.cn: 这些细胞重建了具有正常间距的感受器和腺体.

sentences.en: They have tried to reconstruct the settlement as it would have been in Iron Age times.
sentences.cn: 他们已试着按铁器时代的样子重建这个小村落。

sentences.en: They've decided to reconstruct this building.
sentences.cn: 他们决定重建这栋大楼.

trans.tran_en: to produce a complete description or copy of an event by collecting together pieces of information
